embeds.title: __Quest I:__ Own and verify a UD Domain.

fields.name: Action 1:
fields.value: Connect your wallet and verify here: <#971131096035106827>

fields.name: Action 2:
fields.value: Type in the following here `/mynameis [your UD domain] [your UD email]`

embeds.title: Who are you?
embeds.description:
Stranger! What are you doing here in my home!

*The effects of the Portal drain your energy and you black outÂ·Â·Â·moments laterÂ·Â·Â·you regain consciousness and wake up from a bed*

You are Awake! What is your name stranger?

embeds.title: __Quest 2:__ Populate your UD domain with crypto addresses

fields.name: Action 1:
fields.value: Link the 3 crypto addresses (BTC, ETH, MATIC) to your UD domain. Learn more [here](https://support.unstoppabledomains.com/support/solutions/articles/48001181827-add-crypto-addresses)

embeds.title: Exotic Name!
embeds.description:
That's not a common name? 

__Where are you from?__

embeds.title: __Quest 3:__ Add an NFT PFP to your UD domain

fields.name: Action 1:
fields.value: Add an NFT profile picture to your UD domain. Learn more [here](https://unstoppabledomains.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/48001203741-add-an-nft-pfp-to-your-domain)

embeds.title: You look good
embeds.description:
Not of this Realm I see! Your attire is of a Noble,
perhaps the __Artisan might recognize you__.

embeds.title: Yes?
embeds.description:
Hmm..
Sit still, I will go through my archives.

Don't touch anything!

fields.name: Reminder
fields.value: Type in `/ilooklike` to complete the quest.

embeds.title: __Quest 4:__ Connect socials to your UD domain

fields.name: Action 1:
fields.value: Add and verify at least both your Discord username and Twitter username to your UD domain. Learn more [here](https://unstoppabledomains.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/48001215143-link-social-accounts)

embeds.title: Tavern night!
embeds.description: I knew something was special about! You are a Scribe! We must celebrate, __socialize__ and tell tales.

embeds.description: I told you not to try those matic fries. Come let's see the __apothtacary__ for a potion.

Let me run tests, this will take time.
